title: Clean, Quiet, Upper 1 Bedroom Apartment
posting_body: ['Clean and beautiful 1 bdrm upper apartment ready for a clean, quiet, responsible tenant.', '*Available July 22, 2022*', 'Amenities:', 'Quiet residential neighborhood', 'Private entrance', 'Newer kitchen', 'Window a/c units with remote', 'Forced air heat with digital thermostat', 'Storage area in basement', 'Coin laundry on premises ($1.75/ea per load wash & dry)', 'Rent is $800/month + $800 security.', 'Total needed to move in $1,600.', 'Tenant pays gas & electric.', 'Landlord pays water.', 'One adult spayed/neutered cat allowed w/ pet deposit.', 'Application Requirements:', '$35 application fee.', 'Minimum 1 year at current job or proof of other income source.', 'Minimum FICO score of 625.', 'No evictions or court landlord/tenant judgments past 10 years, positive rental history paying on time with landlord references.', 'Minimum monthly net income requirement $2,000.', 'Pass background check.', 'If you are interested in this apartment, please send us an email and we will get back with you soon to answer any questions you may have and discuss renting the apartment.', 'Thank you for looking.', 'apartment house rent rental apt aprt duplex mt mount clemens harrison township clinton clinton twp macomb twp county mich michigan chesterfield new baltimore eastpointe roseville apartments cat downtown near store cheap safe family bungalow flat multifamily multi family expressway gratiot groesbeck cass hubbard mi condo home house north avenue', 'ave madison st joe hospital lincoln mount mt clemens clemons']
